concept.description: Returns all Spring Components, i.e. all types labeled with "Spring" and "Component", sets a label "Injectable".
concept.cypher: MATCH (component:Spring:Component) SET component:Spring:Injectable RETURN component as Component

concept.description: Labels a Return value of a method, thats annotated with "Bean" with Injectable
concept.cypher: MATCH (configuration:Configuration)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Java:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotationType:Type), (method)-[:RETURNS]->(injectable:Type) WHERE annotationType.fqn = "org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean" SET injectable:Spring:Injectable RETURN injectable as Injectable

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with "org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration" with "Spring", "Configuration" and "Component".
concept.cypher: MATCH (configuration:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotationType:Type) WHERE annotationType.fqn = "org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration" SET configuration:Spring:Configuration:Component RETURN configuration as Configuration

constraint.cypher: MATCH (injectable:Injectable:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(constructor:Constructor), (type:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method)-[newInstance:INVOKES]->(constructor) RETURN type as Type, method as Method, injectable as Injectable, newInstance.lineNumber as LineNumber
